column4: Does anyone know how to change the permissions nautilus mounts an ext4 external harddrive
Does anyone know how to change the permissions nautilus mounts an ext4 external harddrive, I want to be able to mount the drive so that any new files are created with permission of 0777
I have done that sort of thing to a subtree (could be a drive) using ACL's
If you are interested I could send you an example of how to change the UMASK of a subtree using ACL's
